articles.title: California governor calls Trump National Guard deployment in LA ‘unlawful’
articles.description: White House disputes Newsom's characterisation, saying in a statement, “Everyone saw the chaos, violence and lawlessness.”

articles.title: Apple to unveil ‘Liquid Glass’ UI at WWDC 2025, setting stage for all-glass iPhone in 2027: Report
articles.description: Apple will announce its latest operating systems at WWDC 2025, introducing a new naming scheme with iOS26, iPadOS 26, and macOS 26. The updates will feature a transparent UI called Liquid Glass, paving the way for the 2027 iPhone, internally named 'Glasswing'.
